declarations.comments:
Create a Strom from a Kafka consumer.

Subscribes to the given topic and yields BatchMessages.
Uses eachBatch internally with an AVar bridge for backpressure:
the consumer callback blocks until the Strom pulls the batch.
declarations.title: consumeStrom

declarations.comments:
Drain a Strom of Values into a Kafka topic.

Sends each value as an individual message.
declarations.title: drainToKafka

declarations.comments:
Drain a Strom of Values into a Kafka topic in batches.

Groups messages into batches of the given size before sending.
declarations.title: drainToKafkaBatched
